title: My New computer = higher ping on league of Legends 120+ ping
body: Can anyone help with the ping issue? I can play every other game(online) without a hitch but of course League has to be that one game that has issues. Graphically it runs smoother but now it has ping issues. I used to always stay at 30-50 ping. On league. I live at North Carolina.

replies.body: Since you're on a new computer, your network settings might need some tweaking.  Make sure that you've updated your OS as well to the current version!  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help with tuning things up.   Let me know if you have any questions!
